page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = File.Copy_Folder(C sourcefolder ,C targetfolder [,L only_copy_if_newer ])

argument.name: sourcefolder
argument.description: The path of the folder to copy.

argument.name: targetfolder
argument.description: The path of the folder to receive the copied data.

argument.name: only_copy_if_newer
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F. .T. = Only copies newer files. .F. = Copies all files

page.description: Copy all of the files in a folder from one folder to another. All sub-folders are copies as well.
page.discussion: The FILE.COPY_FOLDER() method copies all files and subfolders from Source_Folder to Target_Folder.
